text: Ra u bani isra'ilatira paigambara bha'era janecha. (Bhannecha) ki ma timiharu che'u timro palanaharako tarphabata nisani li'era a'eko chu. Tyo ke bhane timro agadi matoko panksiko rupaka akara bana'umchu. Pheri tyasama phukchu ta tyo allahako adesale (samccai) panksi bha'ihalcha. Ra allahako adesale ma janmaidekhiko andho ra maharogila'i svasthya paridinchu ra murdama prana halidinchu ra je jati timi khanchau ra jejati aphna gharaharuma thuparera rakheka chau, sabai timila'i bata'idinchu. Yadi timi imana lya'eko bha'e yi kuraharuma timra nimti allahako samathryako nisani cha
